name: William Shakespeare
cemeteryFullAddress: Westminster, City of Westminster, Greater London, England
plot: Holy Trinity Church, Stratford-upon-Avon, Warwickshire, England
inscription:
GOOD FRIEND FOR JESUS' SAKE FORBEAR,
TO DIG THE DUST ENCLOSED HERE,
BLESSED BE THE MAN THAT SPARES THESE STONES,
AND CURSED BE HE THAT MOVES MY BONES.

THE GRAVE
OF THE POET
WILLIAM
SHAKESPEARE
1564-1616
citation: Find a Grave, database and images (https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/87136641/william-shakespeare : accessed 10 April 2022), memorial page for William Shakespeare (23 Apr 1564-23 Apr 1616), Find a Grave Memorial ID 87136641, citing Westminster Abbey, Westminster, City of Westminster, Greater London, England; Maintained by Find a Grave.
